item.title: 12.2.1 Diagnostic data
item.description: Diagnostic data # To view Diagnostic Data do the following: Click on Utilities > Technical support > Diagnostic data. Search # To search for diagnostic data for a certain device, do the following: Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select the time period to search. Number plate: Select the device to view. IMEI: Enter the correct IMEI to find.

item.title: 12.2.2 Lost Signal
item.description: Lost signal # To check the device Lost signal at any time - position, do the following: Click on Utilities > Technical support > Lost signal. 1. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select the time period to watch. Time (minute): Select the time to update data when the signal is lost. Device: Select the device to view.

item.title: 12.2.4 Device Check Sim
item.description: Check Device - SIM # To check the device - SIM, do the following: Click on Utilities > Technical support > Check Device - SIM. 1. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: IMEI: Enter the device imei, enter one or more characters. Device name: Enter the name of the device you want to find, enter one or more characters.
